content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, as Peter Schmidt portrayed earlier, I aim to secure the highest possible rent for this property during negotiations. Let's begin discussing the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given our contrasting goals in this negotiation, I must emphasize my intention to seek the lowest price possible for renting this apartment. However, let's engage in a constructive dialogue about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Understood, Yi-Nuo Wang. Despite my pursuit of the maximum rent, I will try to maintain a reasonable dialogue with you. Let's start with a proposed rental price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for providing an initial price figure, but I find 1200 Euros to be quite high for this newly built, unfurnished 50 sqm one-bedroom apartment in the city center. With many comparable options available, I am hoping to negotiate a more competitive rate.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your perspective, Yi-Nuo Wang. Nonetheless, this apartment's prime location in the city center, coupled with its modern construction, justifies the proposed rent. However, to accommodate your concerns, I'm willing to lower the price to 1150 Euros per month as a compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle, 1150 Euros remains significantly above my budget expectations for this particular apartment. Could we consider exploring a rental price closer to 1000 Euros per month, given its size and unfurnished status?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Lowering the rent further to 1000 Euros might not align with my objective to maximize returns on this property, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, to maintain negotiations, let me suggest a revised offer of 1100 Euros per month as a concession.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Although your latest proposal of 1100 Euros per month is more acceptable than the initial 1200 Euros, it still exceeds my desired range for renting this apartment. I must regretfully decline this offer and continue searching for a more affordable option. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price remains too high for my budget. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
